headline: Off-price retailers maintain edge over department stores: UBS
summary: Investing.com -- Off-price retailers continue to outpace department stores in sales and profitability, according to UBS, which rates TJX Companies (NYSE:TJX) and Burlington Stores (NYSE:BURL) as Buys.

headline: The TJX Companies, Inc. Announces 13% Increase in Common Stock Dividend
summary: FRAMINGHAM, Mass., March 31, 2025--The TJX Companies, Inc. (NYSE: TJX) today announced that its Board of Directors has raised the amount of its quarterly dividend by 13% from the last dividend paid. The Board declared a regular quarterly dividend in the amount of $.425 per share, payable June 5, 2025, to shareholders of record on May 15, 2025.
